actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.
Referred to Subcommittee on Rules of the House.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Rules of the House

official_title: A resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to authorize the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct to provide for payment of reasonable attorney's fees of any Member, officer, or employee of the House against whom a complaint is made.

summary.text: Amends rule X of the Rules of the House of Representatives to authorize the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct to provide for payment of attorney's fees for the representation before the Committee of any Member, officer, or employee against whom a complaint is made by the Committee.

titles.title: A resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to authorize the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct to provide for payment of reasonable attorney's fees of any Member, officer, or employee of the House against whom a complaint is made.
